mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, password_hash as password, name as fullName, role, status, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM users WHERE (username = #{usernameOrEmail} OR email = #{usernameOrEmail})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( username, email, password_hash, name, role, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{fullName}, COALESCE(#{role}, 'freelancer'), COALESCE(#{status}, 'active'), NOW(), NOW() )
